CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated via a formula. It stores the current LTV of the loan based on its Collateral Mgmt records. If the Product Feature is NOT a Line of Credit, or if the Product Feature does not exist, this is the formula: (Principal Balance + Total Prior Lien Amount from all Collateral)/ Collateral Value from all Collateral. If the Product Feature is a Line of Credit, this is the formula: Original Loan Amount / (Collateral Value from all Collateral - Total Prior Lien Amount from all Collateral)
CustomField.formula: IF(LLC_BI__Total_Collateral_Value__c - LLC_BI__Total_Superior_Lien_Amount__c == 0, 0, IF( (LLC_BI__Product_Reference__r.LLC_BI__Product_Feature__c != null && LLC_BI__Product_Reference__r.LLC_BI__Product_Feature__r.LLC_BI__Line_Of_Credit__c == true) || NOT(LLC_BI__Is_Booked__c) ,(LLC_BI__Amount__c + LLC_BI__Total_Superior_Lien_Amount__c) / LLC_BI__Total_Collateral_Value__c, (LLC_BI__Principal_Balance__c + LLC_BI__Total_Superior_Lien_Amount__c) / LLC_BI__Total_Collateral_Value__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Principal Balance or Loan Amount / (Collateral Value from all Collateral - Total Prior Lien Amount from all Collateral)
CustomField.label: Current LTV
